sn8.3:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma vangiso alaviyam viharati aggalave cetiye ayasmata nigrodhakappena upajjhayena saddhim.
sn8.3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma vangiso attano patibhanena anne pesale bhikkhu atimannati.
sn8.3:1.4: “alabha vata me, na vata me labha; dulladdham vata me, na vata me suladdham;
sn8.3:1.5: yvaham attano patibhanena anne pesale bhikkhu atimannami”ti.
sn8.3:1.6: Atha kho ayasma vangiso attanava attano vippatisaram uppadetva tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
